name: AS_GCM_ENTRYPOINT_GETDATA_getClauseSetClauseAudit
description: Entry point to retrieve all the Clause Set Clause Audit details
sail_code:
/*

CAUTION: This rule batches the data by querying the primary key from the entities. 
The number of queries will depend on the batchSize which is passed. The purpose of this approach is to handle the memory heap issue.

*/
rule!AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseAudits_V1(
  setId: ri!setId,
  clauseSetAuditIds: ri!clauseSetAuditIds,
  relationAuditIds: ri!relationAuditIds,
  relationIds: ri!relationIds,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  selectionColumns: ri!selectionColumns,
  batchingSize: ri!batchingSize,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  additionalFilters: ri!additionalFilters,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen
)
